NAME: Sum
DOC: Sum[f,{i,i_max}] evaluates the sum. Sum[f,{i,i_min,i_max}] starts with i = i_min. Sum[f,[i,i_min,i_max,di}] uses steps di. Sum[f,{i,{i1,i2,...} uses successive values i1,i2,... . Sum[f,{i,i_min,i_max},{j,j_min,j_max},...] evaluates the multiple sum. Sum[f,i] gives the indefinite sum.
